Obtain a matrix with the weighted average CN per chromosome arm

chr.arm.cnv.Rd

Obtain a matrix with the weighted average CN per chromosome arm

chr.arm.cnv(seg, genome.v = "hg19", verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

seg

(data.frame) segmentation data with 6 columns: sample, chromosome, start, end, probes, segment_mean
hg

(hg19 or hg38) reference genome version to draw chromosome limits and centromeres

Examples

chr.arm.cnv()
